name: distributed-crawling-system-workers
description: Distributed Web Crawling System for CloudFlare Workers

scripts.dev:app: echo 'Static files served by CloudFlare Pages dev server'
scripts.dev:legacy: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run dev:app" "npm run dev:worker:legacy"
scripts.dev:with-build: npm run build && bash deploy-functions.sh && wrangler pages dev --port 8787 ./dist
scripts.build: npm run build:functions && npm run build:routes
scripts.build:functions: cp -r functions dist/ 2>/dev/null || mkdir -p dist && cp -r functions dist/
scripts.deploy:pages: npm run build && bash deploy-functions.sh && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name crawling-system-test
scripts.deploy:pages:test: npm run build && bash deploy-functions.sh && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name crawling-system-test
scripts.deploy:pages:prod: npm run build && bash deploy-functions.sh && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name crawling-system
